Package net.prsv.stimer

Class DataHelper

java.lang.Object
android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
net.prsv.stimer.DataHelper
All Implemented Interfaces:
AutoCloseable
public class DataHelper extends android.database.sqlite.SQLiteOpenHelper
The DataHelper class contains methods for storing Stylus and StylusProfile objects in the database and retrieving them from the local SQLite database.
